sections.heading: Annexation; powers; procedure; hearing
sections.text: (1) Except as provided in sections 13-1111 to 13-1120 and 16-130 and subject to this section, the mayor and city council of a city of the first class may by ordinance at any time include within the corporate limits of such city any contiguous or adjacent lands,

sections.heading: not require legislative body to conduct trial-type evidentiary hearing or make express finding on character of land
sections.text: Meyer v. City of Grand Island, 184 Neb. 657, 171 N.W.2d 242 (1969).
